verses.kjv: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
verses.ct: God takes his place in the divine assembly; he pronounces judgment among the rulers.

verses.kjv: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
verses.ct: "How much longer will you make corrupt decisions and show favoritism to the wicked?" Selah.

verses.kjv: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
verses.ct: "Stand up for the weak and the orphaned; ensure justice for the oppressed and those in need.

verses.kjv: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
verses.ct: Rescue the poor and desperate; free them from the grip of the wicked."

verses.kjv: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
verses.ct: But they have no knowledge and refuse to understand; they stumble around in darkness while the very foundations of the earth are shaken.

verses.kjv: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
verses.ct: I declared, "You are gods; every one of you is a child of the Most High.

verses.kjv: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
verses.ct: Yet you will die just like any mortal and fall like every other ruler."

verses.kjv: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
verses.ct: Rise up, God, and bring judgment on the earth, for every nation belongs to you.
